name: Never use WHEN OTHER THEN NULL
description:
A WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL is almost always a BUG. 

The point of EXCEPTION block is to catch exceptional conditions you are expecting, handle them and continue.
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: A WHEN OTHERS that it will not propagate error back to the client, it is almost always a BUG because it will hide errors from the calling procedures.
remediation: Check the statement and if so, propagate the error back to the client.
total: Number of Artifacts with SQL code having exception handler.
alternativeName: Never use WHEN OTHER THEN NULL
